#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
const int maxn = 1e6+10;
const ull base = 3377;
int n,k,lo,hi,mid,ans,z;
char s[maxn];
ull p[maxn],h[maxn],tmp;
int main(){
    scanf("%d\n",&n);
    gets(s+1);
    p[0]=1;
    for (int i=1; i<=n; i++){
        h[i]=h[i-1]*base+s[i];
        p[i]=p[i-1]*base;
    }
    scanf("%d",&k);
    lo=1;hi=n;
    while (lo<=hi){
        mid=(lo+hi)>>1;
        tmp=h[mid];z=0;
        for (int i=mid; i<=n&&z<k; i++){
            if (h[i]-h[i-mid]*p[mid]==tmp) z++;
        }
        if (z==k){
            ans=max(ans,mid);lo=mid+1;
        } else hi=mid-1;
    }
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    for (int i=1; i<=ans; i++) printf("%c",s[i]);
}
